availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Bullitt County, Kentucky, farm laborer. Kentucky native. Son of William and Sarah Thompson. Married to Minerva Wise on August 16, 1876. Mustered into service as Second Lieutenant of 15th Kentucky Infantry regiment (U.S.A.) on December 14, 1861. Promoted to First Lieutenant on October 9, 1862. Resigned October 26, 1863.

ab.bibl: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bullitt County, p. 210. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bullitt County, District No. 1, p. 14. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bullitt County, p. 277. Kentucky County Marriage Records, 1783-1965, accessed via Ancestry.com. Compiled Service Records of Volunteer Union Soldiers who Served in Organizations From State of Kentucky, NARA RG 94, Microfilm Series M397, Roll 287.
